FuncDef: This command restricts the debug output to messages on a specific peer within the diameter peer policy. Overrides thedebug>diam>diam-peerdebug command for the specified diameter peer policy. A single peer can be specified per diameter peer policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a peer name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies to include Peer State Machine (PSM) events in the debug output.
